parts.text: {"word":"asignar","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"割り当てる、指定する、任命する","english_definition":"to assign, allocate, designate, appoint","examples":[{"sentence":"El jefe va a asignar las tareas a cada empleado.","translation":"The boss is going to assign the tasks to each employee.","note":"割り当てる"},{"sentence":"Me asignaron un nuevo proyecto.","translation":"I was assigned a new project.","note":"割り当てられた"},{"sentence":"Han asignado un nuevo profesor a la clase.","translation":"They have assigned a new teacher to the class.","note":"任命した"}],"collocations":["asignar tareas (assign tasks)","asignar un proyecto (assign a project)","asignar un puesto (assign a position)","asignar recursos (allocate resources)"],"synonyms":["atribuir","designar","destinar","señalar","adjudicar"],"antonyms":["quitar","retirar","desasignar"]}],"etymology":{"value":"From Latin 'assignare', meaning 'to mark out, allot, assign'.","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/asiɣˈnaɾ/","syllables":"a-sig-nar"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["asigno","asignas","asigna","asignamos","asignáis","asignan"],"past_simple":["asigné","asignaste","asignó","asignamos","asignasteis","asignaron"],"future_simple":["asignaré","asignarás","asignará","asignaremos","asignaréis","asignarán"],"present_subjunctive":["asigne","asignes","asigne","asignemos","asignéis","asignen"],"past_subjunctive":["asignara/asignase","asignaras/asignases","asignara/asignase","asignáramos/asignásemos","asignarais/asignaseis","asignaran/asignasen"],"imperative":["asigna (tú)","asigne (usted)","asignemos (nosotros)","asignad (vosotros)","asignen (ustedes)"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"'Asignar' is a transitive verb used to indicate the act of giving someone a task, responsibility, or role. It can also refer to allocating resources or designating something for a specific purpose. The verb is commonly used in professional, academic, and administrative contexts.","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo estoy asignado la tarea.","correct":"Yo estoy asignando la tarea.","note":"Use the gerund form 'asignando' for the present continuous tense."},{"incorrect":"Asigné a mí la responsabilidad.","correct":"Me asignaron la responsabilidad.","note":"Use the reflexive form 'me asignaron' when you are the recipient of the assignment."}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["asignación (assignment, allocation)","asignado (assigned)","asignatura (subject, course)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_corpus":"Commonly used verb.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"The word 'asignar' is used to say that someone is giving a task or responsibility to someone else. You'll often hear this word in work or school when someone is told what they need to do."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"El profesor asignó un ensayo para la próxima semana.","translation":"The professor assigned an essay for next week.","type":"example","meaning_category":"assigning a task"},{"sentence":"La empresa asignó un coche a cada vendedor.","translation":"The company assigned a car to each salesperson.","type":"example","meaning_category":"allocating resources"},{"sentence":"El tribunal asignó un abogado de oficio al acusado.","translation":"The court assigned a public defender to the defendant.","type":"example","meaning_category":"appointing a role"}]}
